title: ∞ The Dalrymple Report: Copenhagen, Eyes, and AI
description: Dave and I are back after a few weeks off. We talk about my wonderful trip to Copenhagen, Denmark, get an update on Daves eye operation and dig into some of the new Apple Intelligence features Apple released in its latest developer beta. Follow this podcast Brought to you by: Oracle Cloud: Upgrade to the next generation of the cloud--Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. You get a single platform for your infrastructure, database, application development, and AI needs. Show Notes: Here Are All of the Apple Intelligence Features in the iOS 18.1 Developer Beta All of the Apple Intelligence Features Not Included in the iOS 18.1 Beta Google Is the Only Search Engine That Works on Reddit Now Telecoms companies now using scambaiting AI systems modelled on Lenny Germans Combat Climate Change From Their Balconies Shows and movies we're watching Halt and Catch Fire, AMC+ The Bear, Hulu
author: Jim Dalrymple

html:
Posted on Friday, August 2nd, 2024 at 6:46 am. PT

Written by Jim Dalrymple

Dave and I are back after a few weeks off. We talk about my wonderful trip to Copenhagen, Denmark, get an update on Daves eye operation and dig into some of the new Apple Intelligence features Apple released in its latest developer beta.

Follow this podcast

Brought to you by:

Oracle Cloud: Upgrade to the next generation of the cloud–Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. You get a single platform for your infrastructure, database, application development, and AI needs.

Show Notes:

  • Here Are All of the Apple Intelligence Features in the iOS 18.1 Developer Beta

  • All of the Apple Intelligence Features Not Included in the iOS 18.1 Beta

  • Google Is the Only Search Engine That Works on Reddit Now

  • Telecoms companies now using scambaiting AI systems modelled on Lenny

  • Germans Combat Climate Change From Their Balconies

Shows and movies we’re watching

  • Halt and Catch Fire, AMC+
  • The Bear, Hulu

Comments are closed.
